✅ ban individual stock ownership for Members
✅ ban former members from Congressional facility perks

text: LGBTQ Americans deserve the same opportunities as everyone else to build good lives in safe, welcoming communities. Proud to be a champion for the #EqualityAct. https://t.co/8VZNNtiw8s

text: After hearing about disparities in insurance coverage for people living with cancer in MN on my Healthcare Listening Tour, I cosponsored the Cancer Drug Coverage Parity Act requiring insurers to cover life-saving oral cancer treatments. Learn more here: https://t.co/ITg39R9IwX
label: D

text: Skyrocketing prescription drug costs are putting affordable healthcare out of reach for too many families in #MN02- in just one year, the cost of one asthma drug increased by 3400%. I’m working hard in Congress every day to #EndRxMonopolyPrices!
label: D

text: Wonderful to have my friend Lester Bagley in the office from the @Vikings. We’re getting ready for training camp and the economic development you’re bringing to Eagan and #MN02! Good luck on the upcoming season! #Skol https://t.co/DP5mHKXNRe
label: D

text: 75 years ago US troops & allies landed in Normandy to liberate Europe. We are forever indebted to the heroes who fought for democracy. That’s why I signed a bipartisan letter requesting a non-Presidential state funeral for the last surviving WW2 Medal of Honor Recipient. #DDay75
label: D

text: MN's economy depends on bright, talented young people, & we need to make sure they have the skills they need to succeed. That starts with taking a new approach to postsecondary education & training, & expanding Career and Technical Education opportunities. https://t.co/37nHKzEgN7

text: Folks in Greater MN deserve quality of life and economic opportunity, no matter where they live. Great to meet with the Minnesota Association of Townships to talk about the needed investments in broadband access and roads/highways in our rural communities. https://t.co/Q4qvt2XMYs
